Title: Relates to adding certain fentanyl derivatives to the schedule of controlled substances; repealer
Summary: Adds certain fentanyl derivatives to the schedule of controlled substances regulated by the department of health.
LawCode: Amd §3306, rpld §3306 schedule II sub (c) ¶6, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to designating certain opiates as schedule I and II substances; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
